/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with a variety of buildings, showcasing the architectural diversity of the city. A red brick building stands out, its vibrant color contrasting with the clear blue sky above. In the distance, a tall apartment building pierces the skyline, adding a modern touch to the urban landscape. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene and highlighting the greenery of the trees lining the street. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of being in the midst of the city's hustle and bustle.
